text: ‘‘eṅkaḷ iṟaivaṉē! Nī ivarkaḷukku vākkaḷittirukkum nilaiyāṉa corkkaṅkaḷil ivarkaḷaiyum ivarkaḷuṭaiya mūtātaikaḷ, ivarkaḷuṭaiya maṉaivikaḷ, ivarkaḷuṭaiya cantatikaḷ ākiya ivarkaḷil uḷḷa nallavarkaḷaiyum pukuttuvāyāka! Niccayamāka nītāṉ (aṉaivaraiyum) mikaittavaṉ, (aṉaittaiyum aṟinta) ñāṉamuṭaiyavaṉ'' eṉṟum
